name: Citric Acid Cycle
description:
A game developed as part of an Honours project at the University of Aberdeen, 2022.

For the best experience: please play on a laptop or a desktop computer (not a mobile device), ensure the game is in fullscreen mode, and if possible use a mouse rather than a trackpad. To launch the game in fullscreen, click the blue button in the bottom right corner of the game.

After you are finished with the game, please take some time to fill out the feedback survey to help me out with my thesis: https://forms.office.com/r/tQ11kHSQn. When requested, please log in using your uni email details.
